scripts.dev: cross-env NODE_ENV=development DOTENV_CONFIG_PATH=.env.development ts-node-dev --respawn --transpile-only -r dotenv/config -r tsconfig-paths/register src/index.ts
scripts.start: cross-env NODE_ENV=production DOTENV_CONFIG_PATH=.env.production node -r dotenv/config dist/index.js
scripts.prisma:migrate:dev: cross-env NODE_ENV=development DOTENV_CONFIG_PATH=.env.development node -r dotenv/config node_modules/prisma/build/index.js migrate dev
scripts.prisma:migrate:prod: cross-env NODE_ENV=production DOTENV_CONFIG_PATH=.env.production node -r dotenv/config node_modules/prisma/build/index.js migrate deploy
scripts.prisma:seed:dev: cross-env NODE_ENV=development DOTENV_CONFIG_PATH=.env.development node -r dotenv/config node_modules/prisma/build/index.js db seed
scripts.prisma:seed:prod: cross-env NODE_ENV=production DOTENV_CONFIG_PATH=.env.production node -r dotenv/config node_modules/prisma/build/index.js db seed
